hero.tagline: Let Your Smile Change the World

about.title: About Dental City
about.p1: Founded by two graduates of the University of Costa Rica (UCR), Dr. Francisco Rodriguez Chaves and Dr. Zaidy Mariela Hernandez Bonilla, Dental City Costa Rica has grown into a trusted name in dental care with over 20 years of clinical experience.
about.p2: With two locations serving Aguas Zarcas and La Virgen de Sarapiqui, we offer a comprehensive range of services from routine care and orthodontics to advanced implant procedures, full-mouth rehabilitation, and in-house 3D diagnostic imaging.
about.p3: Whether you're a local resident or traveling to Costa Rica for affordable, high-quality dental care, our bilingual team is here to make your experience comfortable and stress-free.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From preventive care to complex restorations, we offer a full spectrum of dental services at a fraction of US prices.
services.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive dental care with modern technology, experienced specialists, and prices that make quality accessible to everyone.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.subtitle: We invest in the latest dental technology to deliver more accurate diagnoses, more comfortable procedures, and better results.

team.pageSubtitle: UCR-trained professionals with over 26 combined years of experience, dedicated to your comfort and care.
team.ctaText: Schedule a consultation and experience the Dental City difference. Our team is here to help you achieve the smile you deserve.

gallery.pageSubtitle: Real results, real patients. Take a look at our clinic, our team, and the smiles we help create every day.
gallery.beforeAfterDesc: Drag the slider to compare results. Real patients, real transformations.
gallery.ourFacilitiesDesc: Take a virtual tour of our modern facilities — designed for your comfort and equipped with the latest technology.
gallery.happyLittlePatientsDesc: Kids love visiting Dental City. We make every visit fun, comfortable, and rewarding.
gallery.ctaText: These results speak for themselves. Schedule a consultation and let us create a personalized plan for your smile.

testimonialsPage.pageSubtitle: Real patients, real stories. See why families across Costa Rica and beyond trust Dental City with their smiles.
testimonialsPage.happyPatientsSubtitle: Smiles that speak for themselves — from our youngest patients to full transformations.
testimonialsPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Join Our Happy Patients?
testimonialsPage.ctaText: Schedule a consultation and experience the Dental City difference. Our team is here to help you achieve the smile you deserve.

servicesCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Smile?
servicesCta.text: Contact us today for a consultation. Our team will review your needs and create a personalized treatment plan — at a fraction of US costs.

footer.tagline: Let your smile change the world. Over 20 years providing exceptional dental care across two locations in Costa Rica.
